summary: TAKATA RECALL    IT HAS BEEN OVER ONE YEAR SINCE I WAS FIRST NOTIFIED OF THIS RECALL.  I HAVE CALLED THE AUDI RECALL LINE SEVERAL TIMES AND HAVE RECEIVED NO INFORMATION.  WHEN I HAVE ASKED WHEN I CAN EXPECT THE REPAIR TO BE READY, I AM TOLD THAT PARTS AREN'T AVAILABLE AND THEY'LL SEND ME A LETTER AT SOME POINT.  THEY HAVE NOT BEEN HELPFUL IN THE LEAST.    I HAVE NOT ALLOWED ANYONE TO RIDE IN MY FRONT PASSENGER SEAT BECAUSE OF THE RECALL, AND THIS TIME DELAY IS VERGING ON RIDICULOUS!
